entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
